title: Mean Little Kitty & Waiting Room at the Hero League
description: Two humorous fantasy short stories involving cats.What's a woman to do if her pet cat does something really, really bad...like kill someone he shouldn't? "Mean Little Kitty" involves a cat, a witch, and her teenage son.Good superheroes need good sidekicks, but Brad aka "Clockstopper," finds that the competition can be fierce. "Waiting Room at the Hero League" involves a wizard, cats, deadly flying saucers, and ducks.
author: Kater Cheek
